channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Portable Sonos Play speaker leaks on Canadian Best Buy
item.description: An unannounced Sonos speaker called Play has been spotted on the Canadian Best Buy site. The Sonos Play looks like a slightly shrunk-down version of the Move 2 with a loop on the back for toting it around. While nothing is confirmed yet, it's listed at CAD $399.99 with a release date of March 31st, […]

item.title: AMD is taking the fight to Intel with its most powerful Epyc chips yet — Sorano packs in 84 Zen5 cores and could supercharge the next generation of mobile networks
item.description: AMD introduces 84-core Sorano Epyc chip for telecom networks, emphasizing efficiency and challenging Intel’s entrenched presence in virtualized infrastructure.

item.title: The Pentagon’s Claude Use in Iran Is a Reminder that Anthropic Never Objected to Military Use
item.description: The company objected to hypothetical future use cases, not anything the military is currently doing.

item.title: Blumhouse Wants to Be Perfectly Balanced for Horror Fans
item.description: Jason Blum knows IP is the lifeblood of entertainment right now, but Blumhouse will keep pumping out originals on a regular basis.

item.title: Anthropic's Claude grabs top spot in App Store after Trump's ban
item.description: Anthropic may have lost out on doing business with the US government, but it's gained enough popularity to earn the number one spot on the App Store's Top Free Apps leaderboard. At the top, Claude beat out both ChatGPT and Google Gemini, which respectively sit at the second and third spots on Apple's free apps charts. The sudden surge in user downloads isn't random. It follows news that President Trump has barred any federal agency from using Anthropic's Claude or other AI tools after the AI company refused to concede on certain guardrails. After declining to have its AI models be used for mas...

item.title: Polymarket saw $529M traded on bets tied to bombing of Iran
item.description: Six newly-created accounts made a profit of $1 million by correctly betting that the U.S. would strike Iran by February 28.

item.title: Let’s explore the best alternatives to Discord
item.description: With many users feeling uneasy about Discord's new age verification requirement, here are some alternatives that could be worth exploring.

item.title: I’ve never had a life coach, so I decided to get one—this is what happened
item.description: Homescreen Heroes: Purpose is an AI mentor that provides personalized guidance

item.title: Comment connecter un clavier et une souris sur votre PS5 ?
item.description: La PlayStation 5 est avant tout pensée pour être utilisée avec une manette, mais elle prend aussi en charge les claviers et souris. Que ce soit pour naviguer plus rapidement dans les menus, discuter en jeu ou jouer à certains titres compatibles, connecter ces périphériques peut s’avérer très pratique. Bonne nouvelle : la manipulation est simple et ne nécessite aucun accessoire particulier. ...

item.title: Skate developer Full Circle announces layoffs ahead of new game release
item.description: 'Skate' developer Full Circle announces layoffs ahead of new game release
